entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Carman
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
